articles.description: Gaslighting, ghosting, invisibilising - women in sport are given the full treatment. And it's wholly intangible, which makes explaining it as hard.
articles.content: "I see the difference in how the men's coaches are treated and between the girls and the men's team. ...this country is extremely difficult as a woman. Coming from a culture where you have an opinion… [+10113 chars]
